api_list.name: Color Generator
api_list.description: Generate colors with the latest advances in AI. Perfect for suggesting colors for palettes, gradients, branding, text, and more. Besides brainstorming colors, the Hotpot.ai [color generator](https://hotpot.ai/color-generator) can extract the main colors of an image. Try the free web demo now.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com/generate-color"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com/generate-color"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
